alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 4:08PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Palm Beach County through 500 PM EST... At 407 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle Glade, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Royal Palm Beach, Belle Glade Camp, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Fremd Village-Padgett Island and Caloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
